name: places/ChIJsf60p3L3wokR1zmwVFYlme4
formattedAddress: 2480 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2480 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: This is the worst experience ever!!! If you have long natural hair DO NOT GO to this place! I have long 4c hair & my head was yanked painfully BACK  so many times while braiding/parting that I lost count. I brought in my own hair and I was still charged 220 after being quoted 200. The girl who did my braids did not care that she was working on a HUMAN head with the brutality of her parting and yanking! The customer service is abysmal. The language barrier is RIDICULOUS! If you don’t mind getting your hair ripped out of your head like a practice dummy, feel free to go to this place. RED FLAG: if any braider complains  the entire time about how long your hair is while ACTIVELY braiding your hair…RUN!! . They will never see me again!!!

originalText.text: I went on a Monday it was an excellent experience the ladies are so welcoming and nice my hair came out beautifully i will be back now my braid spot.

text.text: I went on a Monday it was an excellent experience the ladies are so welcoming and nice my hair came out beautifully i will be back now my braid spot.

originalText.text: took 8 hours for short boho braids, they were very rough and yanked and broke my hair. subpar experience, they didn’t listen or do what I asked for after I showed them multiple references and boiled the “human” hair. The client next to me had 5 people braiding her hair and I only had one and she was on her phone the whole time which made it take so long. The language barrier also made it hard for them to understand but that’s why I showed references. overall wouldn’t go again + they damaged my hair. Not worth it!

originalText.text: Very unprofessional. Woman yanked my hair  the whole time. I could literally hear my hair breaking. She asked that I slump in the chair while she’s braiding and complained that my hair is long. I arrived with freshly washed and blow dried hair. She blow dried my hair again unnecessarily. I had two people braiding at the same time and pulling on my hair in opposite direction. Extremely painful. There was an extreme language barrier. They did not understand what I was saying. Even the person translating didn’t quite understand. Took 8 hours for boho knotless with curls.

originalText.text: My blood is still boiling!!! I work 12 hr shifts, came straight to braid shop as promised 8am, Fatima was supposed to braid me, Owner is a liar, they called her soon as I arrived, I thought it was Fatima I was speaking to. Owner is very manipulative, trick is Fatima gave me her business card, in reality, that number is the owner.  Owner told me that morning I arrived, Fatima is coming, let them start. Fatima came in 3 hrs later, didn't even have the decency to tell me sorry , they lied about the price, charged me 220.00. I asked for Bohemian knotless, was NOWHERE near. Then, the braider walked off for like an hour. 8:15 am, didn't leave til 3"30, my hair fu---- up. I could have gotten my usual small box braids to my usual girl uptown for 150.00. This shop is overrated!!!! You're paying for her lifestyle outside the shop. Once a person lies to me, I can't respect you. Ole folks say, "if you lie you'll steal" WELL SAID! EVIL
